title: PM to attend Belt and Road Forum in China on Oct 17-18
content:
At the invitation of President Xi Jinping, Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar will visit China to participate in the ‘Third Belt and Road Forum (BRF) for International Cooperation’, being held in Beijing from 17-18 October 2023.
The Prime Minister will attend the… pic.twitter.com/DNGxGSBiLb
— Prime Minister's Office (@PakPMO) October 14, 2023
PM Kakar will hold a bilateral meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping on the occasion. Senior Chinese officials, business leaders and investors as well as a number of leaders will also attend the Forum.
